p: To control for physical activity level during the intervention all participants will be instructed to keep a logbook of all physical training. Participants in the intervention group will be instructed to record all endurance training lasting more than 10 minutes with a perceived exertion of 15 (strenuous) or higher on the Borg-scale [ 28] and any additional RT session performed. Participants in the control group are instructed to record all endurance training lasting more than 10 minutes with a perceived exertion of 15 (strenuous) or higher on the Borg-scale (29) and all resistance-training sessions.
